name: Help Scout
description: Add a Help Scout Instance to connect your existing Help Scout account to the Help Desk Hub, allowing you to manage your incidents, priorities, statuses, users, etc. across multiple Help Desk Elements. You will need your Help Scout account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Max Page Size (or limit)
configuration.description: Help Scout Max Page Size (or limit)

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Callback Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash header of the event/bulk notification webhook callback payload

resources.description: Retrieves the list of all the users associated with a given mailbox ID from the help desk system. Specifying a mailbox ID that does not exist will result in an error response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

resources.description: Retrieves all the conversations associated with a given mailbox ID and a user ID from the help desk system. Specifying a mailbox ID or a user ID that does not exist will result in an error response.
Retrieves a user associated with a given ID from the help desk system. Specifying a user associated with a given ID that does not exist will result in an error response.
Uploads an attachment to the endpoint helpdesk service. The attachment upload flows through Cloud Elements.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The attachment file to be uploaded.

resources.description: Deletes an attachment to the endpoint helpdesk service.
Retrieves an attachment associated with the attachment ID.
Retrieves the list of all the folders associated with a given mailbox ID from the help desk system. Specifying a mailbox ID that does not exist will result in an error response.

Retrieves all the conversations associated with a given mailbox ID and a folder ID from the help desk system. Specifying a mailbox ID or a folder ID that does not exist will result in an error response.
Webhooks to get notifications.

hooks.body: if(response_headers === null || !(response_status_code === 201 || response_status_code === 200)) {	return; }var location = response_headers["location"];if(location === null) {	return;}location = location.replace("https://api.helpscout.net/v1/hooks/","");location = location.replace(".json","");var newConfig = {  "helpscout.webhook.id" : 	location}; return {	"configuration": newConfig}

resources.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all conversations in the help desk system using CEQL search expression. The search expression in CEQL is the WHERE clause that supports 'mailboxID' field.

hooks.body: if(request_vendor_parameters === null) {    return;}var query = null;var keys = getKeys(request_vendor_parameters);for(var i in keys) {    var key = keys[i];	print(key);    if(key !== "page" && key !== "query"    	&& key !== "status" && key !== "modifiedSince"    	&& key !== "tag") {        if(query === null) {            query ="(";        } else {        	query +=" AND ";        }        query += key +":"+request_vendor_parameters[key];    } else if (key === "query") {    	query = request_vendor_parameters[key];    }}if(query !== null) {	query += ")";		var newQuery = {};	newQuery.page = request_vendor_parameters.page;	newQuery.query = query;	var newPath = "/search/conversations.json";	return {	    "request_vendor_parameters": newQuery,	    "request_vendor_path": newPath,	    "continue" : true	}}

resources.description: Create a new conversation in the help desk system. Conversation creation will flow through Cloud Elements to the help desk service.

hooks.body: var body = JSON.parse(request_vendor_body); var mailboxId = configuration["mailbox.id"];  body["mailbox"] = {  "id": mailboxId}; return {  "request_vendor_body": JSON.stringify(body),  "continue": true }

if(response_headers === null || !(response_status_code === 201 || response_status_code === 200)) {	return;}var location = response_headers["location"];if(location === null) {	return;}location = location.replace("https://api.helpscout.net/v1/conversations/","");location = location.replace(".json","");var response = {	"id": location};return {	"response_body": response}

resources.description:
Delete a conversation associated with a given ID from the help desk system. Specifying conversation associated with a given ID that does not exist will result in an error message.
Needs a Pre-Hook to delete 'content-type' from the header. This is causing an error saying, "Invalid Json". Pre-hook still sends 'authorization, content-type, and accept'.
Retrieves a conversation associated with a given conversation ID from the help desk system. Specifying a conversation with a specified ID that does not exist will result in an error response.
Updates the incidents details associated with a given incident ID. The updated details are passed in 'body' field. Specifying a incident ID that does not exist will result in an error response.
Updates the text of a conversation thread associated with a given conversation ID and thread ID. Specifying a conversation ID or a thread ID that does not exist will result in an error response.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the request to update the thread.

resources.description: Retrieves a mailbox associated with a given mailbox ID from the help desk system. Specifying a mailbox associated with a given ID that does not exist will result in an error response.
Retrieves a list of all mailboxes.

hooks.body: if(response_body === null || response_body.items === null) {	return {		"response_error": "Unable to find the mailbox"	};	}var items = response_body.items;var mailboxId = null;for(var i=0; i< items.length; i++) {var mailBox = items[i];	if(mailBox.name === configuration["mailbox.name"]) {		mailboxId = mailBox.id;		break;	}}if(mailboxId === null) {	return {		"response_error": "Unable to find the mailbox"	};	}var newBody = {	"mailboxId" : mailboxId}; return {	"response_body" : newBody	}

resources.description: Retrieves a list of tags used across all mailboxes. Tags are returned in alphabetical order, A-Z
Retrieves the customers associated in a mailbox from the help desk system.

hooks.body: if(request_vendor_parameters === null) {    return;}var query = null;var keys = getKeys(request_vendor_parameters);for(var i in keys) {    var key = keys[i];    if(key !== "page" && key !== "query") {        if(query === null) {            query ="(";        } else {        	query +=" AND ";        }        query += key +":"+request_vendor_parameters[key];    }}if(query !== null) {	query += ")";		var newQuery = {};	newQuery.page = request_vendor_parameters.page;	newQuery.query = query;	return {	    "request_vendor_parameters": newQuery,	    "continue" : true	}}

resources.description: Create a new customer in the help desk system. Customer creation will flow through Cloud Elements to the help desk service.

hooks.body: if(response_headers === null || !(response_status_code === 201 || response_status_code === 200)) {	return;}var location = response_headers["location"];if(location === null) {	return;}location = location.replace("https://api.helpscout.net/v1/customers/","");location = location.replace(".json","");var response = {	"id": location};return {	"response_body": response}

resources.description: Retrieves the customers associated in a mailbox from the help desk system.
Updates the customers details associated with a given ID. The updated details are passed in 'body' field. Specifying a customer ID that does not exist will result in an error response.

parameters.name: customer json body
parameters.description: The body of the customer to be updated

resources.description: Retrieves all the conversations associated with a given mailbox ID and a customer ID from the help desk system. Specifying a mailbox ID or a customer ID that does not exist will result in an error response.

hooks.body: var formattedEvents = getArray(); var eventObj = {}; eventObj.event_date = events["modifiedAt"]; eventObj.event_object_id = events["id"]; var webhook_types = events.eventHeaders["x-helpscout-event"]; if(webhook_types === 'convo.created') {	eventObj.event_type = 'CREATED';	eventObj.event_object_type = 'incidents';} else if(webhook_types === 'convo.customer.reply.created' || webhook_types === 'convo.assigned' || webhook_types === 'convo.note.created' || webhook_types === "convo.status" || webhook_types === "convo.tags" || webhook_types === "convo.agent.reply.created" || webhook_types === "convo.merged") {	eventObj.event_type = 'UPDATED';	eventObj.event_object_type = 'incidents';		} else if(webhook_types === "convo.deleted"){	eventObj.event_type = 'DELETED';	eventObj.event_object_type = 'incidents';		} else if(webhook_types === 'convo.moved'){	eventObj.event_type = 'MOVED';	eventObj.event_object_type = 'incidents';} else if(webhook_types === 'customer.created'){	eventObj.event_type = 'CREATED';	eventObj.event_object_type = 'users';}formattedEvents.add(eventObj);return {    "events" : formattedEvents    }
